alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 9:09PM CST until January 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch along with blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibilities are also expected. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 AM CST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 3 AM to noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha
